Art I made based on [[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/ofrendas-tres-muertes | Ofrendas: Tres Muertes]]] by [[*user Kilerpoyo]]

//"...There are as many deaths as there are stars in the sky, as there are breaths on the Earth."//


[[/div]]

@@ @@

[[=image https://i.ibb.co/X5b9mT1/comPoyo.png width="1250em"]]

@@ @@

[[div class="blockquote"]]

Then I heard a powerful but gentle voice, a voice that welcomed me to that place beyond life. Astonished and grateful, I asked where I was and who those three thrones belonged to. The invisible speaker told me about the Three Deaths. They are not the [[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/when-we-came-home | Three Deaths of the Old World]]], which many fear and worship: they are Three different Deaths, as solemn as they were festive, guardians of a land as old as the roots of time, a land that some fools insisted and still insist on calling the New World. I shall now tell you, unknown reader, about those who bestow the gift of mercy.

[[/div]]
